title: Which K-pop idols are also popular YouTubers? - Quora

response.answer_text: someone else answered with day6 jae, and i couldn’t agree more. just a couple more came to mind for me though. first of all, being the nct trash that i am: johnny. he doesn’t have his own independent channel, but he runs a popular series on the “nct daily” channel called “johnny’s communication center” that consistently get some of the highest views, and was even the very first video posted on the channel.  (3.4M - 2nd most viewed) ^  (1.9M - 11th most viewed) ^  (1.8M - 15th most viewed) * bonus: not technically johnny’s communication center, but basically johnny’s communication center (2.8M - 3rd most viewed) ,,  clc sorn is also a full blown youtube with her own independent channel! (PRODUSORN) she’s done an assumptions about me video,  QnAs,   a makeup tutorial…  basically just youtube tingz as a bonus, i’ll throw chen in here. he isn’t very active, but he has a cover channel with videos from just over a year ago to last december.

mamamoo solar - 솔라시도 solarsido clc sorn - PRODUSORN day6 jae - JaeSix 2ne1 dara - DARA TV iz*one sakura - ちゃんねる宮脇咲良 f(x) luna - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC06v2Mqte9cfn-3SMwpvFUA exid hyelin - 혜린의마이웨이 blackpink lisa - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC35HKvKYPkri4Grd5KXl3wQ akmu soohyun - Leesuhyun ladies code ashely - Ashley B Choi secret hyosung - 블링달링전효성 crayon pop way - 웨이랜드 WayLand i dont know what exactly you consider popular so i just put everyone i know regardless of number of views and subscribers
The only one I can think of currently is Park Jaehyung (Day6’s Jae). His account is Jaesix on YouTube and currently has 747k subscribers.
